profile.message_mobile: I am a web developer with 2 years of experience. I focus on creating functional applications with an excellent user experience.
profile.message_desktop: I am a web developer with two years of experience in programming and problem-solving. I focus on creating functional applications with an excellent user experience. Throughout my career, I have worked on various projects that have allowed me to improve my skills and learn new technologies.
profile.down: Click to explore more content below

1.description: I was responsible for creating user experiences for an e-commerce site, using the latest web development technologies and approaches. My main focus was on Angular and related technologies to deliver high-performance, visually appealing solutions.

2.role: Full Stack Developer - Clear Minds Consultores
2.description: I was responsible for working on a key project related to the development of web interfaces and forms. My role was to design and develop efficient and attractive user interfaces, as well as manage communication between the frontend and backend of the system. This exciting project involved technologies such as Docker, Java, JavaScript, Bootstrap, and Angular.

3.description: During my internship, I had the opportunity to delve into the exciting world of web development. My main focus was on creating web interfaces using technologies such as HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript. Additionally, I worked with the PHP web development framework Laravel.
